original_title: National Chamber - HKTDC Business Seminar on Friday
original_body_lines: Business Networking Seminar organized by the Hong Kong Trade Development Council (HKTDC) and the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL) will be held on Friday, 24 May at 6.30 p.m. (Sri Lanka time) at Crystal Ballroom, Taj Samudra Hotel, Colombo.

The theme of this seminar is ‘Explore and Expand Global Business Opportunities via Hong Kong”. Also, the seminar will discuss the role of Hong Kong as an international business centre and support provided for Sri Lankan companies (small and medium enterprises), project owners and start-ups to reach out to international markets via Hong Kong.

If you are interested in attending the Business Forum and the networking, you are kindly requested to contact the National Chamber Nishanthi / Thushari (011 4741788 / 2689600 / 076 2 555 707) or send a request to [email protected] ; [email protected] .
Registration will be on first-come-first-served basis, due to limited number of meetings that could be accommodated. Prior registration is mandatory
